name: Microbots (itch) (Andygun1)
description:
After a strange side of circumstances, you are a robot and you have an AI friend! Use it to kill the Microbots that chase you down.

You can't shoot by yourself, but if you wait long enough.. You can activate SUPER which will shoot 25 bullets in rapid succession.

I guess.. Goodluck?
